original_text: Then he returned from the region of Tyre and went through Sidon to the Sea of Galilee, in the region of the Decapolis.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 두로 지방에서 나와 시돈을 지나고 데가볼리 지방을 통과하여 갈릴리 호수에 이르시매

sentences.original_text: Then he returned from the region of Tyre
and went through Sidon to the Sea of Galilee
in the region of the Decapolis.
